scripts.test: npx ts-node src/app.ts ${PORT:-3000} & run-p test:*; unset PORT && pgrep -f 'npx ts-node src/app.ts' | xargs kill -9
scripts.test:GET: if curl -X GET http://localhost:${PORT:-3000} 2> /dev/null | grep -xs 'GET is sended.'; then echo 'GET is successed.'; else echo Error && exit 1; fi
scripts.test:POST: if curl -X POST http://localhost:${PORT:-3000} 2> /dev/null | grep -xs 'POST is sended.'; then echo 'POST is successed.'; else echo Error && exit 1; fi
